arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Atlético de Madrid: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head
arts.sum: Liverpool’s clinical Anfield form powered them to 21 group stage points, while Atlético’s defensive record shines under Simeone. Key men Salah and Griezmann chase personal milestones.

arts.ttl: Jurgen Klopp's loss to Atletico Madrid 'didn't feel right' as bitter Liverpool swipe taken
arts.sum: Liverpool will renew acquaintances with Atletico Madrid on Wednesday with one victory for the Spanish side leaving a seriously sour taste in Jurgen Klopp's mouth as he took aim at Diego Simeone

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Atletico Madrid – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Premier League champions Liverpool begin their Champions League campaign on Wednesday with a mouth-watering clash against Diego Simeone’s Atletico Madrid at Anfield. The Reds will put their perfect domestic start and a formidable home European record on the line against the notoriously resilient Spanish side. arts.ttl: Will Alexander Isak Play Against Atletico Madrid in Liverpool’s Champions League Opener?
arts.sum: Arne Slot has confirmed that Isak is in the squad for Liverpool’s Champions League opener.

arts.ttl: "Anfield debut against Atletico": What role will Isak play for the Reds in UCL?
arts.sum: Liverpool will take on Atletico Madrid in the Champions League on Wednesday at Anfield, and fans will hope to see Alexander Isak on the pitch.

arts.ttl: Liverpool includes Isak in squad for Champions League game vs. Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot confirmed Isak is in the squad for the game at Anfield after not including the striker for Sunday’s 1-0 win over Burnley in the Premier League. Speaking ahead of the game against Atletico, Slot said Isak could play some part.
